choices.text:
Write an email to my boss letting them know I am leaving the company
Subject: Resignation Letter - [Your Name]
Dear [Boss's name],
I hope this email finds you well. I regret to inform you that I have decided to resign from my position as [your job title] at [company name]. My last day of work will be on [date].
I would like to take a moment to express my gratitude for the opportunities and experiences I've had during my time here. It has been an honor working with such talented individuals, and I have learned so much from all of you. The skills and knowledge that I gained while working at this company will be invaluable as I move forward in my career.
I understand the impact this decision may have on our team, and I want to assure you that I am willing to do everything possible to ensure a smooth transition for everyone involved. Please let me know if there is anything else I can do before my departure date.
Thank you again for your support during my time here, and I wish the company all the best in its future endeavors. If you need any references or recommendations from me, please don't hesitate to ask.
Sincerely,
[Your Name]
